SCRIPT.MSCRI: restore database [&rm_db#] from disk ='C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL11.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\Backup\ara_master.bak' with move 'ara' to 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL11.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\DATA\&rm_db#.mdf', move 'ara_log' to 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL11.MSSQLSERVER\MSSQL\DATA\&rm_db#_log.ldf', REPLACE ;
